title: The Role of Alternative Investments in Asset Allocation
description: Phil Huber, chief investment officer at Savant Wealth Management and author of The Allocator's Edge: A Modern Guide to Alternative Investments and the Future of Diversification speaks with Barron's senior writer Lauren Foster about the future of the traditional 60/40 portfolio, the role of alternative investments in asset allocation, and ways investors can add alternatives to their portfolios.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
itunes:summary: Phil Huber, chief investment officer at Savant Wealth Management and author of The Allocator's Edge: A Modern Guide to Alternative Investments and the Future of Diversification speaks with Barron's senior writer Lauren Foster about the future of the traditional 60/40 portfolio, the role of alternative investments in asset allocation, and ways investors can add alternatives to their portfolios.
content:encoded: Phil Huber, chief investment officer at Savant Wealth Management and author of The Allocator's Edge: A Modern Guide to Alternative Investments and the Future of Diversification speaks with Barron's senior writer Lauren Foster about the future of the traditional 60/40 portfolio, the role of alternative investments in asset allocation, and ways investors can add alternatives to their portfolios.
